title: Computational Ethnographic Research Methodology in Digital Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Acquisition of advanced research methodologies for analyzing corporate language learning program effectiveness

learning_goals: Distinguish and explain three approaches of computational ethnography in digital learning environments: virtual ethnography, quantitative ethnography, and computational ethnography
Practice designing ethnographic research utilizing large-scale digital data
Develop a mixed-methods research protocol applicable to corporate language learning programs
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
